Sentencas: Ammonia offers several advantages over hydrogen as an alternative fuel.
Titulo: Improved performance of ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with SSZ thin film electrolyte and Ni-SSZ anode functional layer

Sentencas: However, using ammonia as a hydrogen source for fuel cells has not been received enough attention.
Titulo: Improved performance of ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with SSZ thin film electrolyte and Ni-SSZ anode functional layer

Sentencas: In present paper, Scandia-stabilized Zirconia (SSZ) thin film electrolyte and Ni-SSZ anode functional layer were developed by tape casting in order to obtain high power output performance in ammonia, the results of a SOFC running on ammonia were described and its performance was compared with that when running on hydrogen.
Titulo: Improved performance of ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with SSZ thin film electrolyte and Ni-SSZ anode functional layer

Sentencas: In order to improve the performance of the cell at higher temperatures, the anode was modified by iron through infiltration.
Titulo: Improved performance of ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with SSZ thin film electrolyte and Ni-SSZ anode functional layer

Sentencas: A direct comparison of the performance of the modified cell running on either hydrogen or ammonia showed that the cell in ammonia generated slightly higher power densities at 700 and 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Improved performance of ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with SSZ thin film electrolyte and Ni-SSZ anode functional layer

Sentencas: The performance in ammonia, using the anode catalyst, was comparable to that in hydrogen indicating ammonia could be treated as a promising alternative fuel by selecting an appropriate catalyst.
Titulo: Improved performance of ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with SSZ thin film electrolyte and Ni-SSZ anode functional layer
